mapper.select: SELECT proctor.*,teacher.teacherName,classroom.classroomName,period.periodname from proctor ,teacher , classroom ,period WHERE proctor.teacherID=teacher.teacherID AND examRoomID=classroom.classroomID and proctor.periodID=period.periodID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proctor ( batch, proctor.examRoomID, proctor.ifFinished, proctor.teacherID, proctor.periodID, proctor.upOrDownYear, proctor.`week`, proctor.`year` ) VALUES ( ${batch}, ${examroomid}, ${ifFinished}, ${teacherid}, ${periodid}, ${upOrDownYear}, ${week}, ${year} )
mapper.select: SELECT proctor.*,teacher.teacherName,classroom.classroomName,period.periodname from proctor ,teacher , classroom ,period WHERE proctor.teacherID=teacher.teacherID AND examRoomID=classroom.classroomID and proctor.periodID=period.periodID and proctor.examID=#{examID}
mapper.update: UPDATE proctor SET proctor.teacherID=#{teacherid},proctor.examRoomID=#{examroomid}, proctor.periodID=#{periodid}, proctor.batch=#{batch},proctor.ifFinished=#{ifFinished},proctor.upOrDownYear=#{upOrDownYear}, proctor.`week`=#{week},proctor.`year`=#{year} WHERE proctor.examID=#{examid}
mapper.select: select proctor.*,classroom.classroomName,period.periodname from proctor,classroom,period where proctor.examID in (select examID from (select Max(proctor.examID) as examID from proctor group by proctor.examRoomID,proctor.periodID,proctor.upOrDownYear,proctor.`week`,proctor.`year`) as t) AND proctor.examRoomID=classroom.classroomID AND proctor.periodID=period.periodID AND proctor.ifFinished=0 AND classroom.maxSize > (SELECT COUNT(studentbooking.studentBookingID) FROM studentbooking where proctor.examID=studentbooking.examID)
